member.summary: If a new version of the application is available, the method returns a formatted string: a URL or UNC path.

member.name: M:AddinExpress.RTD.ADXRTDServerModule.CheckForUpdates
member.summary: Runs the ClickOnce application associated with the RTD Server to check if there is a new version of the server in the update location. Can be used only if the RTD Server was deployed with Add-in Express ClickOnce Solution.

member.name: M:AddinExpress.RTD.ADXRTDServerModule.CreateProcess(System.String)
member.summary: Creates a new process of the same integrity level as its parent process. The new process executes the specified executable file.
member.param: The path to the executable file to launch.

member.summary: Returns the container of the RTD Server module.

member.summary: Returns True if the add-in was registered/installed via MSI-based Web installer.

member.name: M:AddinExpress.RTD.ADXRTDServerModule.IsMSIUpdatable
member.summary: Returns True if the user is permited to update the application. In Vista or Windows 7, it is always True.
